verses.text: <a href="../1-Chronicles-1-1/" title="1 Chronicles 1:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1  "JESUS_END"Adam, Sheth, Enosh,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-2/" title="1 Chronicles 1:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2  "JESUS_END"Kenan, Mahalaleel, Jered,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-3/" title="1 Chronicles 1:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3  "JESUS_END"Henoch, Methuselah, Lamech,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-4/" title="1 Chronicles 1:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4  "JESUS_END"Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-5/" title="1 Chronicles 1:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5  "JESUS_END"The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-6/" title="1 Chronicles 1:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6  "JESUS_END"And the sons of Gomer; Ashchenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-7/" title="1 Chronicles 1:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7  "JESUS_END"And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-8/" title="1 Chronicles 1:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8  "JESUS_END"The sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-9/" title="1 Chronicles 1:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9  "JESUS_END"And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabta, and Raamah, and Sabtecha. And the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-10/" title="1 Chronicles 1:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10  "JESUS_END"And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be mighty upon the earth.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-11/" title="1 Chronicles 1:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11  "JESUS_END"And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-12/" title="1 Chronicles 1:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12  "JESUS_END"And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (of whom came the Philistines,) and Caphthorim.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-13/" title="1 Chronicles 1:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13  "JESUS_END"And Canaan begat Zidon his firstborn, and Heth,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-14/" title="1 Chronicles 1:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14  "JESUS_END"The Jebusite also, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-15/" title="1 Chronicles 1:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15  "JESUS_END"And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-16/" title="1 Chronicles 1:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16  "JESUS_END"And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-17/" title="1 Chronicles 1:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17  "JESUS_END"The sons of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-18/" title="1 Chronicles 1:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18  "JESUS_END"And Arphaxad begat Shelah, and Shelah begat Eber.
19 "JESUS_END"And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of the one was Peleg; because in his days the earth was divided: and his brother's name was Joktan.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-20/" title="1 Chronicles 1:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20  "JESUS_END"And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-21/" title="1 Chronicles 1:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21  "JESUS_END"Hadoram also, and Uzal, and Diklah,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-22/" title="1 Chronicles 1:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22  "JESUS_END"And Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,
23 "JESUS_END"And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab. All these were the sons of Joktan.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-24/" title="1 Chronicles 1:24 KJV verse detail"><span id="26" class="versehover">24  "JESUS_END"Shem, Arphaxad, Shelah,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-25/" title="1 Chronicles 1:25 KJV verse detail"><span id="27" class="versehover">25  "JESUS_END"Eber, Peleg, Reu,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-26/" title="1 Chronicles 1:26 KJV verse detail"><span id="28" class="versehover">26  "JESUS_END"Serug, Nahor, Terah,
27 "JESUS_END"Abram; the same is Abraham.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-28/" title="1 Chronicles 1:28 KJV verse detail"><span id="30" class="versehover">28  "JESUS_END"The sons of Abraham; Isaac, and Ishmael.
29 "JESUS_END"These are their generations: The firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-30/" title="1 Chronicles 1:30 KJV verse detail"><span id="32" class="versehover">30  "JESUS_END"Mishma, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-31/" title="1 Chronicles 1:31 KJV verse detail"><span id="33" class="versehover">31  "JESUS_END"Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These are the sons of Ishmael.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-32/" title="1 Chronicles 1:32 KJV verse detail"><span id="34" class="versehover">32  "JESUS_END"Now the sons of Keturah, Abraham's concubine: she bare Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan; Sheba, and Dedan.
33 "JESUS_END"And the sons of Midian; Ephah, and Epher, and Henoch, and Abida, and Eldaah. All these are the sons of Keturah.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-34/" title="1 Chronicles 1:34 KJV verse detail"><span id="36" class="versehover">34  "JESUS_END"And Abraham begat Isaac. The sons of Isaac; Esau and Israel.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-35/" title="1 Chronicles 1:35 KJV verse detail"><span id="37" class="versehover">35  "JESUS_END"The sons of Esau; Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-36/" title="1 Chronicles 1:36 KJV verse detail"><span id="38" class="versehover">36  "JESUS_END"The sons of Eliphaz; Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-37/" title="1 Chronicles 1:37 KJV verse detail"><span id="39" class="versehover">37  "JESUS_END"The sons of Reuel; Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-38/" title="1 Chronicles 1:38 KJV verse detail"><span id="40" class="versehover">38  "JESUS_END"And the sons of Seir; Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan.
39 "JESUS_END"And the sons of Lotan; Hori, and Homam: and Timna was Lotan's sister.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-40/" title="1 Chronicles 1:40 KJV verse detail"><span id="42" class="versehover">40  "JESUS_END"The sons of Shobal; Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon; Aiah, and Anah.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-41/" title="1 Chronicles 1:41 KJV verse detail"><span id="43" class="versehover">41  "JESUS_END"The sons of Anah; Dishon. And the sons of Dishon; Amram, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
42 "JESUS_END"The sons of Ezer; Bilhan, and Zavan, and Jakan. The sons of Dishan; Uz, and Aran.
43 "JESUS_END"Now these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom before any king reigned over the children of Israel; Bela the son of Beor: and the name of his city was Dinhabah.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-44/" title="1 Chronicles 1:44 KJV verse detail"><span id="46" class="versehover">44  "JESUS_END"And when Bela was dead, Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-45/" title="1 Chronicles 1:45 KJV verse detail"><span id="47" class="versehover">45  "JESUS_END"And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.
46 "JESUS_END"And when Husham was dead, Hadad the son of Bedad, which smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Avith.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-47/" title="1 Chronicles 1:47 KJV verse detail"><span id="49" class="versehover">47  "JESUS_END"And when Hadad was dead, Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his stead.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-48/" title="1 Chronicles 1:48 KJV verse detail"><span id="50" class="versehover">48  "JESUS_END"And when Samlah was dead, Shaul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his stead.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-49/" title="1 Chronicles 1:49 KJV verse detail"><span id="51" class="versehover">49  "JESUS_END"And when Shaul was dead, Baalhanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.
50 "JESUS_END"And when Baalhanan was dead, Hadad reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Pai; and his wife's name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-51/" title="1 Chronicles 1:51 KJV verse detail"><span id="53" class="versehover">51  "JESUS_END"Hadad died also. And the dukes of Edom were; duke Timnah, duke Aliah, duke Jetheth,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-52/" title="1 Chronicles 1:52 KJV verse detail"><span id="54" class="versehover">52  "JESUS_END"Duke Aholibamah, duke Elah, duke Pinon,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-1-53/" title="1 Chronicles 1:53 KJV verse detail"><span id="55" class="versehover">53  "JESUS_END"Duke Kenaz, duke Teman, duke Mibzar,
54 "JESUS_END"Duke Magdiel, duke Iram. These are the dukes of Edom.
